page_content: The document discusses guidelines for allocating an increased care factor in day schools for students with special care requirements.
The page provides information about an upcoming Muse concert in Bern, advising attendees to use public transport and account for increased traffic.
The page discusses tax-deductible depreciation rates and the need to declare the total amount of depreciations and value adjustments.
The page announces a general outdoor fire and fireworks ban in the Canton of Bern due to high risk of forest fires.
The page states that supplementary benefits and compensation for helplessness are tax-free.
